00029 #ifndef LBANN_DATA_READER_NCI_HPP
00030 #define LBANN_DATA_READER_NCI_HPP

00032 #include "lbann_data_reader.hpp"

00034 
00035 
00036 namespace lbann
00037 {
00038   //@todo rewrite data_reader class to follow coding convention
00039   class data_reader_nci : public DataReader
00040   {
00041     public:
00042       data_reader_nci(int batchSize, bool shuffle);
00043       data_reader_nci(int batchSize);
00044       data_reader_nci(const data_reader_nci& source); //copy constructor
00045       data_reader_nci& operator=(const data_reader_nci& source); //assignment operator
00046       ~data_reader_nci();
00047 
00048       int fetch_data(Mat& X);
00049       int fetch_label(Mat& Y);
00050       int getNumLabels() { return m_num_labels; } //@todo; check if used
00051 
00052       bool load(const std::string infile);
00053       bool load(const std::string infile,size_t max_sample_count, bool firstN=false);
00054       bool load(const std::string infile, double validation_percent, bool firstN=false);
00055 
00056       size_t get_num_samples() {return m_num_samples;}
00057       size_t get_num_features() {return m_num_features;}
00058       inline int map_label_2int(const std::string label);
00059 
00060       int get_linearized_data_size() { return m_num_features; }
00061       int get_linearized_label_size() { return m_num_labels; }
00062 
00063     private:
00064       //@todo add response mode {binary,ternary, continuous}
00065       int m_num_labels;  //2 for binary response mode
00066       size_t m_num_samples; //rows
00067       size_t m_num_features; //cols
00068       std::vector<int> m_labels;
00069       std::map<int,double> m_index_map;
00070       std::string m_infile; //input file name
00071   };
